document.full_text: american stacy lewis kept her cool on rock-hard greens in sweltering desert heat to grab a commanding three-shot lead in the second round of the kraft nabisco championship on friday.
document.title: lewis takes charge at sun-baked mission hills
lines_and_colors: american stacy lewis kept her cool on rock-hard greens in sweltering desert heat to grab a commanding three-shot lead in the second round of the kraft nabisco championship on friday.
